Song.title: At The Cross
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge Â© 2007 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb |]
Verse 1: [Eb]At the cross we see Your mercy, [Eb]pouring forth in streams of blood [Ab2]At the cross we see compassion, [Ab2]flowing like a crimson flood [Cm]At the cross we see our Savior, [Bb/D]and the beauty of His love At the [Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb]cross
Verse 2: [Eb]At the cross we find forgiveness, [Eb]making foul sinners clean [Ab2]At the cross we find Your power, [Ab2]setting captive prisoners free [Cm]At the cross we find our Savior, [Bb/D]who secured our victory At the [Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb]cross
Chorus: We must [Ab2]sing Your [Cm]praise, O [Eb2]God We must [Ab2]sing Your [Cm]praise, O [Bbsus4]God We have [Cm]met Your [Bb/D]mercy And [Db2]seen Your [Ab/C]beauty How [Ab2]great Your gl[Bbsus4]ory at the cr[Eb]oss
Verse 3: [Eb]At the cross our debt is cancelled, [Eb]Paid in full when Jesus died [Ab2]At the cross our souls are ransomed, [Ab2]Purchased with the blood of Christ [Cm]At the cross our sin is conquered, [Bb/D]Heaven's gates are opened wide At the [Eb | Eb | Eb | Eb]cross
